name: Zombie Killer (Slangwhanger)
description:
Zombie Killer.

This game is the next mini game to focus mainly on the server replication and testing, each player can host their own server and have a total of 7 people join and help in slaying zombies.

Zombie come in waves, and the next wave starts when only 5 zombies are left on the map.

Controls are WASD to move character,
Space to Jump
Left shift to sprint
Left mouse button to shoot
Right mouse button to aim
C key to Crouch
T key will open the in game chat.

To start the game, you need to select a character first - I have included 3 demo maps, that are the default demo map's from the Polygon asset packs.

Updates:

I will be adding an update to this soon, trying to test out a persistent server, where everyone can join in help of the slaying endless zombies.

  1. Bounding boxes have been added to the worlds
  2. A new custom feature added, that links the game to the telegram group to give updates on the creation of servers, players joining and player deaths.
  3. Small bug fixes, including reloading glitch.
  4. Mouse sensitivity has been adjusted as this was to slow for some people on max setting.
  5. Added in Med kits (community request).
